meanings.definition: A wheel located at the front of an aircraft or vehicle to support the nose and facilitate steering.
meanings.sent1: The small plane's nosewheel helped it turn smoothly on the runway.
meanings.sent2: The pilot gently steered the aircraft using the nosewheel.
meanings.sent3: The nosewheel on the toy plane made it easy for the child to pretend to fly.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the nosewheel that steered her towards success.
meanings.sent5: The shiny nosewheel gleamed in the sunlight as the plane taxied on the tarmac.

meanings.sent1: The mechanic will nosewheel the new aircraft before its first flight.
meanings.sent2: They decided to nosewheel the vintage car for better control.
meanings.sent3: I need to nosewheel my bicycle for a smoother ride.
meanings.sent4: She will nosewheel her skateboard to make it easier to maneuver.
meanings.sent5: The team will nosewheel the robot with a new front wheel for improved performance.
